title: Albania Bank Lending Rate
description: Bank Lending Rate in Albania increased to 4.61 percent in September from 4.16 percent in August of 2022. Bank Lending Rate in Albania averaged 4.27 percent from 2015 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 6.18 percent in December of 2015 and a record low of 3.20 percent in February of 2021. In Albania, the bank lending rate is the weighted average rate of interest charged on loans by commercial banks to private individuals and companies. This page provides - Albania Bank Lending Rate- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Albania
